/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in shades of green and blue, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Bare trees punctuate the scene, their leafless branches reaching towards the sky. The sky itself is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The image appears to have been taken from a drone or a high-angle camera, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings.
